scripts.start: python -c "import BaseHTTPServer, SimpleHTTPServer;import ssl;httpd = BaseHTTPServer.HTTPServer(('localhost', 4443), SimpleHTTPServer.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler);httpd.socket = ssl.wrap_socket (httpd.socket, certfile='./server.pem', server_side=True);httpd.serve_forever()"&
scripts.bundle: jspm bundle-sfx app/js/mobile.js app/b_mobile.js & jspm bundle-sfx app/js/desktop.js app/b_desktop.js & jspm bundle-sfx plugin/js/plugin.js b_plugin.js & wait
scripts.bundle_chrome:
jspm bundle-sfx extensions/chrome/es6_run_ext.js extensions/chrome/run_ext.js && echo "
Please go to chrome://extensions and reload the Chrome Extension
"
scripts.deploy: jspm bundle-sfx --minify app/js/mobile.js app/b_mobile.js & jspm bundle-sfx --minify app/js/desktop.js app/b_desktop.js & jspm bundle-sfx --minify plugin/js/plugin.js fzz.min.js & wait && cp fzz.min.js b_plugin.js
